articles.description: Rachin Ravindra has replaced Bracewell in New Zealand's squad for the upcoming ODIs against Sri Lanka
articles.content: Michael Bracewell has played seven Tests, 19 ODIs and 16 T20Is for New Zealand  •  BCCI

articles.title: WATCH: Hardik Pandya seemingly ignores Virat Kohli during 1st IND-AUS ODI, ex-captain's reaction goes viral - Times Now
